name: Flowmaps
description:
About

Auto-Layout Flowmap blocks, labels and sections anytime you want to start creating UX flowmaps.


Use this file with your choice of Arrow plugins easily and without any hassle.


Updates

11/20/2020

  • Fixed issues caused by the new Auto Layout update


10/28/2020

  • Added color styles for faster updates


11/3/2020

  • Added decision block (auto-layout)


11/6/2020

  • Cleaned up components with variants
  • Added Icons to represent iOS/Android/Web flows
